title: Beer O'Clock Wear Watch Face
description: Beer O’Clock is a watch face for Android Wear. With this simple application you can easily keep track of the most important thing in the world - when can I have my first beer of the day?Beer O’Clock has a beautiful interface with fluid animations while still maintaining the battery-life of your wearable. When the clock starts to get closer to 5 o’clock the amount of “beer” in the watch face will increase until, at 5 pm, it’s completely full. The current time is also included, whatever, who cares."Android Wear Flat Device Frame" (http://cyrilmottier.com/2014/07/31/android-wear-flat-device-frame/) by Cyril Mottier is licensed under CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)"LGE G Watch R Device Frame" (https://github.com/danybony/wear-device-frames) by Daniele Bonaldo is licensed under CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)Created by Boldsie http://boldsie.com
descriptionHTML:
Beer O’Clock is a watch face for Android Wear. With this simple application you can easily keep track of the most important thing in the world - when can I have my first beer of the day?

Beer O’Clock has a beautiful interface with fluid animations while still maintaining the battery-life of your wearable. When the clock starts to get closer to 5 o’clock the amount of “beer” in the watch face will increase until, at 5 pm, it’s completely full. The current time is also included, whatever, who cares.

"Android Wear Flat Device Frame" (http://cyrilmottier.com/2014/07/31/android-wear-flat-device-frame/) by Cyril Mottier is licensed under CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)

"LGE G Watch R Device Frame" (https://github.com/danybony/wear-device-frames) by Daniele Bonaldo is licensed under CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)

Created by Boldsie http://boldsie.com
